name: emi.unicore-xuudb
description: The XUUDB server is Attribute Source implementation which can be used by UNICORE servers. It is used to map user credentials (an X509 certificate or X500 distinguished name) to authorisation and incarnation attributes.
releaseNotes:
What's new

    * There are no implementation or functionality changes, except of providing the software as a binary RPM package.



Deployment notes

    * NONE - this is an initial RPM release



Known issues

    * None
changeLog: Put the Change logs here (multiline field)
